Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Adam Sandler is a Trump supporter.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the website Definition.org is a reliable source of information, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the website Definition.org "revealed" that Adam Sandler was a Trump supporter, when in fact the website only featured a misleading ad and a clickbait article.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Adam Sandler did not appear on any page of the clickbait article on Definition.org that listed celebrities who supported Trump.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim leaves open the possibility that Sandler privately supported and voted for Trump, but it also presents alternative explanations such as the ad featuring a picture of Sandler being misleading or a different person with the same name donating to Trump.
